body_html:
What's your bazel version? You may need to turn on wrappers.
Please take a look at the last comments in
bazelbuild/bazel#2075

BTW, we have no CI build for windows-bazel-GPU config. So, I don't think it is well supported. It may break often.
body_text:

body:
What's your bazel version?  You may need to turn on wrappers.
Please take a look at the last comments in 
https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/issues/2075

BTW, we have no CI build for windows-bazel-GPU config. So, I don't think it is well supported.  It may break often.
